chapters.description: Explore the history, concepts, and threats in cybersecurity.
chapters.goal: Understand basic cybersecurity terminology and principles.
chapters.mini_project: Create a basic personal cybersecurity checklist.

chapters.description: Learn about malware, phishing, social engineering, and other common threats.
chapters.goal: Identify and describe various types of cyberattacks.
chapters.mini_project: Design a phishing awareness campaign for your friends and family.

chapters.description: Explore core security principles like confidentiality, integrity, and availability.
chapters.goal: Apply fundamental security best practices in daily life.
chapters.mini_project: Conduct a security audit of your personal devices and accounts.

chapters.description: Understand basic networking concepts like TCP/IP, OSI model, and common protocols.
chapters.goal: Grasp the basics of how networks function.
chapters.mini_project: Set up a basic network topology with virtual machines.

chapters.description: Learn how firewalls and IDS protect networks from unauthorized access and malicious activity.
chapters.goal: Configure basic firewall rules and understand IDS functionalities.
chapters.mini_project: Set up a basic firewall using open-source software.

chapters.description: Explore popular network security tools like Nmap, Wireshark, and Metasploit.
chapters.goal: Gain hands-on experience with network security tools.
chapters.mini_project: Perform a port scan on a target system using Nmap.

chapters.description: Learn about the most common web application vulnerabilities.
chapters.goal: Identify and understand the OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities.
chapters.mini_project: Analyze a simple web application for potential vulnerabilities.

chapters.description: Learn best practices for writing secure code in JavaScript and React.
chapters.goal: Develop secure coding habits and avoid common vulnerabilities.
chapters.mini_project: Build a secure login system using React.

chapters.description: Understand different authentication methods and authorization mechanisms.
chapters.goal: Implement secure authentication and authorization systems.
chapters.mini_project: Implement JWT-based authentication in a React application.

chapters.description: Learn about encryption algorithms, hashing functions, and digital signatures.
chapters.goal: Understand the basics of cryptography and its applications in cybersecurity.
chapters.mini_project: Encrypt a simple message using a basic encryption algorithm.

chapters.description: Explore symmetric and asymmetric encryption algorithms and their use cases.
chapters.goal: Differentiate between symmetric and asymmetric encryption and their advantages/disadvantages.
chapters.mini_project: Implement a simple symmetric encryption algorithm in JavaScript.

chapters.description: Learn about data encryption at rest and in transit, data loss prevention, and privacy regulations.
chapters.goal: Understand the principles of data security and privacy.
chapters.mini_project: Research and present on a specific data privacy regulation (e.g., GDPR, CCPA).
